--- select_complex_with_array_path.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  ComplexTable,
  ComplexTable.IntArray

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:   ",",
        Left: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 30,
            Name:    "ComplexTable",
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.PathTableExpr{
          Path: &ast.Path{
            Idents: []*ast.Ident{
              &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 34,
                NameEnd: 46,
                Name:    "ComplexTable",
              },
              &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 47,
                NameEnd: 55,
                Name:    "IntArray",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM ComplexTable, ComplexTable.IntArray
